name: Simon Escapes (LionBrotherhood)
description: Simon Escapes is a beat 'em up inspired by the story of Simon Radowitzky, an anarchist prisoner, who tried to escape from the penitentiary of Ushuaia, a maximum security prison, located in the southernmost city of the world. Follow him on his escape from the mortal island of Tierra del Fuego. Fight against prison guards who will try to forcibly take you to your cell.
